title: Aaagh!! Its the Mr Hell Show (XviD DVDrip)
description:
Original Source: Region 0 PAL DVD (25fps) 
Video: 608x336 (16:9) XviD 2-Pass @ 800kbps 
Audio: LAME MP3 VBR 2 @ 44100hz 

Release Notes
This is the complete first and only season of the Mr. Hell Show, complete with the Bonus Extras and Pictures. 
Even though the show itself aired in 2000, it was only released this year (2007) on DVD. 

Episode List
01. Mr Hell Moves In 
02. Edukashun 
03. Triple Indemnity 
04. From Here To Paternity 
05. Big Buzznizz 
06. Mr Hell Takes Buckingham Palace 
07. Hellathon 
08. Animation Special 
09. Run Like Hell 
10. Prince Not So Charming 
11. Deep Thought 
12. Blinded By Science 
13. The Seven Ages 

Extras
01. Mid Air Collision 
02. Near Mid Air Collision 
03. Singing Corpses Anamatic 
04. Further Adventures of the King 
05. Mr Hell Original Pilot 
06. Mr Hell Trailers
